com.sap.cloud.sdk.cloudplatform.security.user

Class UserAccessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sap.cloud.sdk.cloudplatform.security.user.UserAccessor

  • public final class UserAccessor
extends Object
    Main class find and access User.

    This class handles the access to a User by delegating the calls to the underlying UserFacade.

      • setUserFacade

        public static void setUserFacade(UserFacade userFacade)
        Replaces the default UserFacade instance. This method is for internal use only.
        Parameters:
        userFacade - The facade to replace the current/default one with.

      • getCurrentUser

        public static User getCurrentUser()
                           throws UserNotAuthenticatedException,
                                  UserAccessException
        Returns the current User.
        Returns:
        The current User.
        Throws:
        UserNotAuthenticatedException - If the current User is not authenticated.
        UserAccessException - If there is an issue while accessing the User.

      • getUserByName

        public static com.google.common.base.Optional<User> getUserByName(@Nullable
                                                                  String name)
                                                           throws UserAccessDeniedException,
                                                                  UserAccessException
        Returns the current User by its name, if it exists.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the user to find.
        Returns:
        An optional, wrapping the user with the given name.
        Throws:
        UserAccessDeniedException - If accessing user information is denied.
        UserAccessException - If there is an issue while accessing the User.
